name: Source Engine Compiled AI Nodegraph File
summary: Learn about .AIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The original nodegraph is created using the Level Designer component of the Source engine SDK, which is called the Valve Hammer Editor. Once complete, an AIN file is automatically compiled by the Source engine when the game is loaded. The compiled AIN file is saved to the \​maps\​graphs\​ directory within the game installation directory.
NOTE: The Valve Source engine is used for games such as Half-Life 2 and Team Fortress 2.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
